products.title: iPhone 6
products.description: The iPhone 6 is a stylish and capable smartphone with a larger display and improved performance. It introduced new features and design elements, making it a popular choice in its time.

products.title: iPhone 13 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro is a cutting-edge smartphone with a powerful camera system, high-performance chip, and stunning display. It offers advanced features for users who demand top-notch technology.

products.title: iPhone X
products.description: The iPhone X is a flagship smartphone featuring a bezel-less OLED display, facial recognition technology (Face ID), and impressive performance. It represents a milestone in iPhone design and innovation.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S7
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S7 is a flagship smartphone known for its sleek design and advanced features. It features a high-resolution display, powerful camera, and robust performance.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S8
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S8 is a premium smartphone with an Infinity Display, offering a stunning visual experience. It boasts advanced camera capabilities and cutting-edge technology.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S10
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S10 is a flagship device featuring a dynamic AMOLED display, versatile camera system, and powerful performance. It represents innovation and excellence in smartphone technology.
